title: Coxinhas (Brazilian chicken croquettes)
ingredients: ['For the filling', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 small chicken breasts, cooked and shredded', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', 'chopped green olives, to taste', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'For the pastry', '475ml chicken stock', '30g butter', '250g plain flour', 'salt to taste', 'For breading', '2 eggs, beaten', 'plain flour', 'breadcrumbs', 'oil for frying']
